title: Confidence in Tua, GMFB Emmy, Top 5 Tough tackles, Overlooking Steelers? and 2nd year QBS
itunes:title: Confidence in Tua, GMFB Emmy, Top 5 Tough tackles, Overlooking Steelers? and 2nd year QBS
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with heavy hearts as the Country digests the tragedy in Texas.  Hosts Peter Schrager, Rachel Bonnetta, Adam Rank and Fmr NFL DB DeAngelo Hall discuss the confidence in Tua Tagovailoa right now.  Peter reveals that the show has won an Emmy before DeAngelo delivers his Top 5 hardest RBs to tackle.  With news that Omar Khan has been named as the Steelers next GM, the table looks at what to expect in Pittsburgh this season.  Peter feels like we owe Chris Johnson an apology and which 2nd year QB's are feeling the most pressure?

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
